entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
